en: Your life goes by.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
Shed your tears on every hour,
For death cuts us with a scythe.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
Dry your body with the fast,
Guard your soul with the cross.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
Keep your eyes upon the casket,
Spend all your days in tears.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
Love the narrow path,
Be a servant of the sick.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
Angel of God save us,
Lead us to cry for our sins.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.

ru: День и ночь к Нему взывай,
en: Day and night cry out to Him,
And put your hope in God.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
In the Heavenly Gardens you will live,
And you will find much joy there.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
You will hear at every hour,
The sweet voice of the Cherubim.

ru: Боже мой, Боже мой, Боже мой,
en: My God, My God, My God,
Creator of mine.
